thread.title: Mogambo or Gabbar who is the best B'Town villain
thread.title_full: Mogambo or Gabbar who is the best B'Town villain

title: Mogambo or Gabbar who is the best B'Town villain
text: Mogambo or Gabbar who is the best B'Town villain Thursday, 22 October 2015 (4 minutes ago) New Delhi , Oct. 22: Dussehra is here and so is the joy of putting the witty Ravan to flames along with his brother Kumbhkaran and son Meghnath, but have you ever wondered who the best 'Ravans' i.e villains of the B'Town are?
